title: How to Make Homemade Soap with Natural Colorants
description: Learn the benefits of homemade soap, how to source natural fats, and using natural colorants to create vibrant colors that are nourishing with herbs and spices.
content:encoded: Learn the benefits of homemade soap, how to source natural fats, and using natural colorants to create vibrant colors that are nourishing with herbs and spices.
itunes:subtitle: Using Spices and Herbs to Color Soap
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
